channel.title: life on 杰哥的{运维,编程,调板子}小笔记
channel.description: Recent content in life on 杰哥的{运维,编程,调板子}小笔记

item.description: Finally the end of Senior 2 arrives. I'm on the way to Senior 3. The summer vacation is rather short which is really common in China. These days I have been diving into Emacs by subscribing both emacs and emacs-devel mailing list. It contributes to my English as well. I can learn a lot of new words and expression thanks to the nice and convenient feature of looking up a word in iOS.
